data.name: fantastic-mr-fox
data.title: Fantastic Mr. Fox
data.description: An urbane fox cannot resist returning to his farm raiding ways and then must help his community survive the farmers' retaliation.
data.creator: Wes Anderson

data.name: wall-e
data.title: WALL-E
data.description: A robot who is responsible for cleaning a waste-covered Earth meets another robot and falls in love with her. Together, they set out on a journey that will alter the fate of mankind.
data.creator: Andrew Stanton
